formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Linear: 2*x + 3 Quadratic: x^2 - 4*x + 2 Trigonometric: sin(x), cos(x), sin(x)/x Exponential / log: exp(0.3*x), log(x,10) Absolute value: abs(x) Piecewise (basic): use if(x < 0, -x, x) kind of structures (math.js style).
